name: 拉斐尔·科恩
introduction: Rafaëlle was born in Paris, and raised in London, also lived in Yaoundé (Cameroun), Milan, Berlin, Seoul, Barcelona, and learned 7 languages.She graduated with a double degree from one of the best Engineering Universities in France (Ecole Centrale Paris), and one of the best Architecture Universities in Italy (Politecnico di Milano), and then realized her true dream was to tell stories that inspire the world, sing and dance. A year after graduation she quit her consultant job to become an actress. She is now dedicated to creating music and films that tell the stories of beauty and magic that exist in this world, to intuitive living and the celebration of life in each moment, and she speaks about her path around the world.Rafaëlle is also a poet, and composer songwriter, and has lately been working on her album, and scriptwriting, in between gigs and shootings around the world from LA to Macao and many cities in between.(source: Rafaëlle Cohen's website https://www.rafaellecohen.com/)In 2011, she decided to become an actress and musical performer and has never stopped performing since : La Belle au bois dormant, que veillent les fées... (Sleeping Beauty), Sister Act, Dance of the Vampires.In 2017, she portrayed the role of one of the Bimbettes in the Disney film Beauty and the Beast.In 2019, she portrayed the role of Sara in the American and German film Berlin, I Love You. She appeared as a lead character in the segment "Transitions", directed by Josef Rusnak. In 2021, she starred as Anne Boleyn, Queen of England, in the BBC docu-drama series The Boleyns: A Scandalous Family.(source: Wikipedia)
